<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 14"
    pfs="Restricted"
>
[Memory Palace](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1374)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Structure" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=153" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 80</row>

**Price** 4,200 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk**  when not activated
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A _memory palace_ is an elaborate magical structure that safely stores memories for easy access. It appears to be a miniature Taldan villa small enough to fit in the palm of a human hand.

<document level="2" id="action-1062" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Memory Palace
